param.name: run_intronerate_bool
param.label: Run Intronerate?
param.help: Run intronerate to recover fasta files for supercontigs with introns.

param.name: create_heatmap_bool
param.label: Generate Heatmap?
param.help: Generate a heatmap of the gene recovery

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
Run the Hybpiper pipeline
.. class:: infomark
Everything of note that the pipeline generates will be sorted into files and then packaged into a single ZIP file.
.. class:: warningmark
Hybpiper, by default, expects unpaired reads, two for each sample. Every sample must share the same name and a _R1/_R2 prefix to indicate they are a pair.
.. class:: infomark
Example: NG440_R1_test.fastq and NG440_R2_test.fastq
